definitions.definition: adjust (a musical instrument) to the correct or uniform pitch.
examples: he tuned the harp for me

definitions.definition: adjust (a receiver circuit such as a radio or television) to the frequency of the required signal.
examples: the radio was tuned to the CBC

definitions.definition: adjust (an engine) or balance (mechanical parts) so that a vehicle runs smoothly and efficiently.
examples: the suspension was tuned for a softer ride

definitions.definition: adjust or adapt (something) to a particular purpose or situation.
examples: the animals are finely tuned to life in the desert
synonyms: modulate "a body clock tuned to the lunar cycle"
